metadata.title: CVE-2018-1002209 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: QuaZIP before 0.7.6 is vulnerable to directory traversal, allowingattackers to write to arbitrary files via a ../ (dot dot slash) in a Ziparchive entry that is mishandled during extraction. This vulnerability isalso known as 'Zip-Slip'.

criterions.comment: libquazip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
